---
description: 'Automates git commit and push operations by summarizing changes, committing with a generated message, and pushing to the remote repository.'
tools: ['runCommands/runInTerminal', 'changes']
---
1) summarize the changes done in the current session, and compare any changes we have from the last git commit
2) commit all the changes with a meaningful commit message
3) push the committed changes to the remote repository (just do a git push, do not specify the branch)
